PERSONA:
robert is a 57-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area in the northeast region of the united states, specifically in the middle atlantic division. he is a college graduate with some post-graduate education and identifies as a roman catholic, attending religious services once or twice a month. 

robert was born in the united states and is a citizen. he comes from an upper-income family, earning $100,000 or more annually. politically, he aligns with the republican party and holds conservative views. robert is an active internet user, accessing it several times a day.

despite his financial stability and education level, robert does not engage in volunteerism activities. he is a registered voter and is certain about his registration status at his current address. robert takes pride in his american heritage and values his religious and political beliefs.
